name: Class PKCS8EncodedKeySpec
text:
This class represents the ASN.1 encoding of a private key,
 encoded according to the ASN.1 type PrivateKeyInfo.
 The PrivateKeyInfo syntax is defined in the PKCS#8 standard
 as follows:

 
 PrivateKeyInfo ::= SEQUENCE {
   version Version,
   privateKeyAlgorithm PrivateKeyAlgorithmIdentifier,
   privateKey PrivateKey,
   attributes [0] IMPLICIT Attributes OPTIONAL }

 Version ::= INTEGER

 PrivateKeyAlgorithmIdentifier ::= AlgorithmIdentifier

 PrivateKey ::= OCTET STRING

 Attributes ::= SET OF Attribute

methods.description: Returns the key bytes, encoded according to the PKCS #8 standard.

Returns the name of the encoding format associated with this
 key specification.
